name: Vishal Ramane

name: Nitin Kaushal
review: I am happy to learn a lot of topics in this course. The thing which attracts the most is the way he explains every concept in this course and implement.

name: Keerthivenkatesh
review: Really amazing course each lecture are very clear cut explanation. His way of teaching style are very superb! Whenever anyone asked me, for javascript. Definitely I recommended this.
